item.title: CVE-2019-5448|2024-08-04T19:54:53.646Z -- yarn -- yarn
item.description: Yarn before 1.17.3 is vulnerable to Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data due to HTTP URLs in lockfile causing unencrypted authentication data to be sent over the network.
